entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero with temperature rising to 7 by morning.

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High 9.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the morning then west 70 gusting to 100. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
